links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
formula: a(n) = (9 * n mod 2 + 1) * a(floor(n/2)) + n mod 2. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 10 2012
prog: (Haskell)a038585 0 = 0a038585 n = (9 * m + 1) * (a038585 n') + m where (n', m) = divMod n 2-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 10 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
